title: Nossa Senhora da Boa Nova (Chapel of)
original_title: Nossa Senhora da Boa Nova (Capela de)
body: In the place of this name, in the parish of São Gonçalo, is the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Boa Nova, founded in 1701 by Eusébio da Silva Barros.

São Gonçalo: Site of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Boa Nova

Eusébio da Silva Barros: Founder of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Boa Nova

1701: Foundation of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Boa Nova
